name: > (right caret)
description:
This is a prototype game made for My First Game Jam, Summer 2017. It's a 2D shmup meant to look like a Terminal emulator.

The game is called & # 62;  , the unicode command for > (right caret), which acts as the player's ship. 

In-Game Controls are:

WASD - movement

J - shoot

This game is a prototype.

Thanks for playing!
